channel.title: Vanguard RSPS - PK Instantly
channel.description:
Vanguard RSPS was publicly launched at the beginning of March, 2015.
[size=24pt][u][b]Links[/b][/u][/size]:
[ul][li][b]Forums[/b]: http://vanguardrsps.com/[/li] [li][b]Play[/b]: http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/topic/8-play/[/li] [li][b]Vote for an amazing reward[/b]: http://vanguardrsps.com/vote/[/li] [li][b]Store[/b]: http://www.rsps-pay.com/store.php?id=339&tab=1200[/li][/ul]
[size=24pt][u][b]Features[/b][/u][/size]:
[ul][li]PK Instantly[/li] [li]Custom Bossing[/li] [li]Amazing Starter + Free Shops[/li] [li]Great uses for cash[/li] [li]Customizable completionist cape[/li] [li]Dicing & Amazing Staking[/li] [li]Great Prices[/li] [li]Custom minigames[/li] [li]Questing[/li] [li]Daily updates[/li] [li]3 premium ranks[/li] [li]Functional & cosmetic customs[/li] [li]Staff positions always available[/li] [li]Incredible skilling, with updates to skilling frequently made[/li][/ul]

item.title: Vanguard RSPS - PK Instantly
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Why do you have “vote for an amazing reward”?

People shouldn’t have to vote for the rewards you give, they should be voting because your server is good. Do you not have any sort of belief that your server will be enjoyable?

Read full topic

item.title: Vanguard RSPS - PK Instantly
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

[quote=“justus69, post:4, topic:550826”][quote author=popcorn57 link=topic=669739.msg4478432#msg4478432 date=1427767026]
I would like 37 orders of the “100 Purchase Points” that are 90.00$ ea.
[/quote]
I just want to buy em and then refund it all and see the look on his face[/quote]
lol

Read full topic
